title: Bitcoin ETFs Mean 'Substitution' From Gold Into BTC Will Continue, Says Cathie Wood
description: While bitcoin's price is often denominated against fiat currencies, Wood pointed out that even relative to gold, BTC has risen consistently since its early days.

title: Solana Price Rebounds as Network Restarts After Outage
description: The Solana network was down almost five hours before a software patch brought it back online, marking the first major outage in nearly a year.

title: Fireblocks partners with BCB Group to offer crypto-to-fiat off-ramp with over 30 currencies
description: The infrastructure provider now enables instant exchanges from crypto to EUR, CHF, GBP, and other currencies.

title: Hidden Winners: 3 Bargain Cryptocurrencies Set to Soar in Less Than a Month
description: The crypto market has tumbled recently despite the approval of Bitcoin ETFs by the SEC. However, crypto market experts believe that the market will recover with Conflux (CFX), Rebel Satoshi (RBLZ), and Mantle (MNT) leading the market upswing in the upcoming months.

title: Fed Rate Decision Spurs Bitcoin Price Surge; Rebel Satoshi, Dogecoin Rival  Makes Major Strides
description: The recent decision by the Federal Reserve to maintain its benchmark interest rate has sent shockwaves through the financial markets, triggering a notable surge in the price of Bitcoin.

title: Bitcoin Upturn Following Decrease in GBTC Outflows; Analysts Predict Hype for Shiba Inu Rival
description: Market dynamics can change in the blink of an eye. Recently, Bitcoin experienced a noteworthy upturn, defying expectations following a decrease in Grayscale GBTC outflows. Meanwhile, analysts are eyeing a potential hype surge for the Shiba Inu rival, Rebel Satoshi.

title: Solana Mainnet Beta Experiences Outage, Swift Action Taken by Engineers
description: The Solana mainnet beta recently encountered a significant outage, prompting immediate action from engineers and contributors across the ecosystem.  The issue, which led to a temporary halt of the network, was met with a coordinated response involving the development and deployment of a new validator software patch. title: UK Government Considers Binding Requirements for AI Companies
description: The UK government is poised to introduce targeted binding requirements for select companies developing highly capable artificial intelligence (AI) systems, marking a significant step in its response to the AI whitepaper consultation. title: Bitsonic Executives Sentenced in Multi-Million Dollar Fraud Case
description: In a landmark case that has sent shockwaves through the cryptocurrency industry, the Seoul Eastern District Court has sentenced the CEO of Bitsonic, a prominent South Korean virtual currency exchange, to a substantial prison term. title: Polygon (MATIC) Prepares for Lift-Off: On-Chain Metrics Signal Mega Rally Ahead
description: While Polygon’s price has barely moved in the last month, its on-chain metrics have been soaring, hitting 400 million unique addresses, with 15.2 million new users in January.
